title: Die in the Dungeon
description:
Die in the Dungeon is a deck-building, turn-based roguelite game where your deck is not made out of cards, but DICE. In Die in the Dungeon , each dice represents a different action, from basic ones like attacking or healing to boosting other dice or copying their abilities. Shadow of the Ninja â€“ Reborn
Improve the quality of your dice, combine them and acquire powerful relics to defeat the monsters that dwell in the dungeon! Find great synergies by combining dice with unique abilities to create powerful and bizarre decks!

game_info.Genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
